002.name: Bang
002.text: Big, I've got something to say...

003.name: Bang
003.text: You're the best pilot and friend I could have dreamed of.

004.name: Bang
004.text: It's an honor to save people together with you !

006.name: Bang
006.text: Aww, I'm getting teary-eyed... But there's no time to waste !

007.name: Bang
007.text: Someone, somewhere, needs us ! So let's get a move on !
